nodes.text: Derek Arnold is an English puppeteer and actor who worked as a creature and droid performer in Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens. He also portrayed Lanever Villecham, the Luggabeast (along with Tom Wilton), and Vober Dand in The Force Awakens, and Pao and the Bor Gullet in the 2016 anthology film, Rogue One: A Star Wars Story.
